TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi ToolboxBitmapAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: 可讓您指定圖示以表示容器中的控制項，例如 Microsoft Visual Studio 表單設計工具。

span.span: Allows you to specify an icon to represent a control in a container, such as the Microsoft Visual Studio Form Designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以套用至控制項，讓容器，例如 Microsoft Visual Studio 表單設計工具，可以擷取圖示表示的控制項。You can apply a to a control so that containers, such as Microsoft Visual Studio Form Designer, can retrieve an icon that represents the control. 圖示點陣圖本身時，可以在檔案中或內嵌在組件中包含的控制項。The bitmap for the icon can be in a file by itself or embedded in the assembly that contains the control. 您在中內嵌點陣圖大小控制項的組件 （或在不同的檔案存放區），則應該是 16 x 16。The size of the bitmap that you embed in the control's assembly (or store in a separate file) should be 16 by 16. 方法的物件可以傳回小型 16 x 16 映像或大型 32 由 32 映像，它會建立藉由調整小型影像。The method of a object can return the small 16 by 16 image or a large 32 by 32 image that it creates by scaling the small image. 如果您想要使用不同版本的組件中的不同版本的圖示，您不需要修改每個版本。If you want to use different versions of your icons with different versions of your assembly, you do not have to modify the for each version. 相反地，您可以在其中宣告組件或是，並指定每個組件版本的組態值。Instead, you can declare the assembly with a or a , and specify a configuration value for each assembly version. 在此情況下，檔案名稱會由解譯點陣圖後置詞附加。In this case, a file name indicated by a is interpreted with the bitmap suffix appended. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別來設定`stop.bmp`的 [工具箱] 圖示`StopSignControl`。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class to set `stop.bmp` as the toolbox icon for the `StopSignControl`. 這個範例假設名為 16 x 16 像素點陣圖是否存在`stop.bmp`在 c:\\。This example assumes the existence of a 16-by-16-pixel bitmap named `stop.bmp` at c:\\. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples/cpp/usercontrol1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples/CS/usercontrol1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples/VB/usercontrol1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用建構函式來設定`stop.bmp`的 [工具箱] 圖示`StopSignControl`。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor to set `stop.bmp` as the toolbox icon for the `StopSignControl`. 這個範例假設名為 16 x 16 像素點陣圖是否存在`stop.bmp`在 c:\\。This example assumes the existence of a 16-by-16-pixel bitmap named `stop.bmp` at c:\\. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples/cpp/usercontrol1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples/CS/usercontrol1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples/VB/usercontrol1.vb#1)]

param.name: t

span.span: A whose defining assembly is searched for the bitmap resource.

summary.span: 根據指定組件中內嵌為資源的 16 x 16 點陣圖，初始化新的 物件。

span.span: Initializes a new object based on a 16 x 16 bitmap that is embedded as a resource in a specified assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會定義所指定之類型的組件中的內嵌資源搜尋`t`參數。This constructor searches for an embedded resource in the assembly that defines the type specified by the `t` parameter. 建構函式會搜尋資源，名為的 namespace.classname.bmp，其中命名空間是包含所指定的類別定義`t`參數。The constructor searches for a resource named namespace.classname.bmp, where namespace is the namespace containing the definition of the class specified by the `t` parameter. 例如，如果 ControlA 處於 NamespaceA AssemblyA.dll 中，然後建構函式搜尋 AssemblyA.dll 名為 NamespaceA.ControlA.bmp 的資源。For example, if ControlA is in NamespaceA in AssemblyA.dll, then the constructor searches AssemblyA.dll for a resource named NamespaceA.ControlA.bmp. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用建構函式以設為 [工具箱] 圖示的按鈕控制項的圖示名為`StopSignControl3`。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor to set the icon of the button control to the toolbox icon for a named `StopSignControl3`. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples/cpp/usercontrol1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples/CS/usercontrol1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples/VB/usercontrol1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會定義所指定之類型的組件中的內嵌資源搜尋`t`參數。This constructor searches for an embedded resource in the assembly that defines the type specified by the `t` parameter. 建構函式會搜尋資源，名為的 namespace.name，其中命名空間是包含所指定的類別定義`t`參數。The constructor searches for a resource named namespace.name, where namespace is the namespace containing the definition of the class specified by the `t` parameter. 例如，假設 ControlA 是在 AssemblyA.dll NamespaceA 中的類別，並傳遞"MyBitmap.bmp 」，以`name`參數。For example, suppose that ControlA is a class in NamespaceA in AssemblyA.dll and that you passed "MyBitmap.bmp" to the `name` parameter. 然後建構函式會 AssemblyA.dll 搜尋名為 NamespaceA.MyBitmap.bmp 的資源。Then the constructor searches AssemblyA.dll for a resource named NamespaceA.MyBitmap.bmp. ## Examples ' 下列的程式碼範例示範如何使用建構函式來設定`StopSignControl2.bmp`作為 [工具箱] 圖示`StopSignControl2`。'The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor to set `StopSignControl2.bmp` as a toolbox icon for the `StopSignControl2`. 這個範例假設名為 16 x 16 像素點陣圖是否存在`StopSignControl2.bmp`使用其**BuildAction**屬性設定為**EmbeddedResource**。This example assumes the existence of a 16-by-16-pixel bitmap named `StopSignControl2.bmp` with its **BuildAction** property set to **EmbeddedResource**. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples/cpp/usercontrol1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples/CS/usercontrol1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples/VB/usercontrol1.vb#2)]

param.span: 內嵌點陣圖資源的名稱。

span.span: The name of the embedded bitmap resource.

param.name: large
param.span: 指定這個方法是否傳回大型影像 (true) 或小型影像 (false)。

span.span: Specifies whether this method returns a large image (true)or a small image (false).

param.span: 小型影像為 16 x 16，而大型影像為 32 x 32。

span.span: The small image is 16 by 16, and the large image is 32 x 32.

summary.span: 根據嵌入組件的點陣圖資源傳回 物件。

span.span: Returns an object based on a bitmap resource that is embedded in an assembly.

returns.span: 以擷取的點陣圖為基礎的 物件。

span.span: An object based on the retrieved bitmap.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會搜尋名為的 namespace.imgName，命名空間的命名空間的資源包含所指定之類型的定義`t`參數。This method searches for a resource named namespace.imgName, where namespace is the namespace containing the definition of the type specified by the `t` parameter. 例如，假設您傳遞 typeof （controla） 至`t`參數，而且 「 MyBitmap.bmp"傳遞給 imgName 參數。For example, suppose you pass typeof(ControlA) to the `t` parameter and you pass "MyBitmap.bmp" to the imgName parameter. 如果 ControlA 處於 NamespaceA AssemblyA.dll 中，這個方法會搜尋 AssemblyA.dll 名為 NamespaceA.MyBitmap.bmp 資源。If ControlA is in NamespaceA in AssemblyA.dll, then this method searches AssemblyA.dll for a resource named NamespaceA.MyBitmap.bmp. 這個方法被要擷取內嵌於組件的 16x16 點陣圖資源。This method is intended to retrieve a 16 x 16 bitmap resource that is embedded in an assembly. 不過，沒有內嵌的點陣圖具有大小為 16 x 16 的需求。However, there is no requirement that the embedded bitmap has a size of 16 x 16. 從組件 （無論大小） 擷取點陣圖會被視為小型影像。The bitmap that is retrieved from the assembly (no matter what size) is considered the small image. 大型映像的建立方式調整 「 小型 」 的映像，將大小設為 32 x 32。The large image is created by scaling the "small" image to a size of 32 x 32. 所以大型映像一律是 32 x 32，不論點陣圖從組件中擷取的大小。So the large image will always be 32 by 32, regardless of the size of the bitmap retrieved from the assembly.
